definition: "hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
to launch an all-out attack (idiom)/to roundly condemn/to castigate

sentences.english: Like the Bakewell tart, the pork pie comes in a variety of forms.
sentences.chinese: 豬肉餡餅像貝克韋爾撻一樣，有着各種各樣的形式。

sentences.english: An almond tart, stuffed with the sweet, ripe fruit.
sentences.chinese: 杏仁撻，裏頭塞滿了熟透的甜蜜水果。

sentences.english: Australian rock lobster with timbale of green vegetable, crabmeat, caviar and bell pepper coulis.
sentences.chinese: 澳洲龍蝦配蔬菜撻，蟹肉，魚子醬及甜椒汁。

sentences.english: It has been a long time since I last had them.
sentences.chinese: 上次我喫蛋撻和煎堆已是很久以前的事。

sentences.english: Whenever Thresher Beast becomes blocked, defending player sacrifices a land. It destroys everything in its path, including the path itself. Illus.
sentences.chinese: 每當撻地獸受到阻擋時，防禦玩家犧牲一張地。

sentences.english: Warm Chocolate Tarte, with Caramelized Hazelnuts, Berry sauce, Cream spoons.
sentences.chinese: 熱巧克力撻，配焦糖榛子，野莓和奶油。

definition: to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip
to throw oneself at/to pounce on/to devote one's energies/to flap/to flutter/to dab/to pat/to bend over
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)
thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal
simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)
to neglect/to skip (class or work)/to waste (time)/vast/loose-fitting
flexible/not rigid/spongy/soft or runny (not set hard)/loose (soil)
surname Lou/one of the 28 lunar mansions in Chinese astronomy
